title: Google sibling SandboxAQ bursts onto the quantum scene like the Kool-Aid Man
content:
We’re firmly entrenched in the quantum era. There weren’t any announcements and there wasn’t any fanfare. It just sort of happened. One day we were in the deep learning era and the next we’d gone quantum. If we had to put a date on it, here at Neural we’d choose 22 March, 2022. That’s the day SandboxAQ slipped out of stealth mode and starbursted out of the Alphabet (Google) research blanket. There’s a certain risk involved in attaching such significance to a relatively unknown company. And SandboxAQ isn’t exactly building iPhones or autonomous vehicles. It’s solving really hard problems with…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Google
description: Oh yeah! Who the heck is SandboxAQ and why are they suddenly the belle of the ball in quantum land? We talked to CEO Jack Hidary to find out.
